article.aria-label: Note from Superintendent Strieker Coronavirus Update

h3.a: Note from Superintendent Strieker Coronavirus Update

div.div: To: District 40 Faculty, Staff, and Families March 12, 2020 Re: Coronavirus Update Dear District 40 Families,
Fan Bus Permission Slip to attend the SIJHSAA Boys Basketball State Game on Monday, February 10th - Must be turned in by 9:00 am to the school offices.

article.aria-label: SCH Exploring Your Future in Healthcare

h3.a: SCH Exploring Your Future in Healthcare

div.div: On behalf of the Board of Education, Administration, staff, and students, I would like to welcome you to Marissa Community Unit School District #40 where we believe that every child has the potential to learn and become a productive citizen. Within the past five years, both faculty/staff and students in both buildings have earned state or national recognition. In 2007 and 2009, Marissa Jr High School was recognized as a Bronze Emblem School by the U.S News and Report and the Elementary earned a Spot Light Award from the Illinois State Board of Education in 2009.
